actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain restrictions on the rights of officers and employees of the Postal Service, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Eliminates the present restrictions under law on the rights of officers and employees of the Postal Service to strike against the United States, and to be a member of an organization of employees of the Government which asserts the right to strike against the Government of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain restrictions on the rights of officers and employees of the Postal Service, and for other purposes.
